names.name: Peter
names.text: We  have  seen  at  the  start  that  Backend  is  one  of  the  three  pillars  that  forms your  web  app.  But  there is  a  lot  of  work  to  do  even  if  we  even  simply  want  to  create  a  service  for  data  retrieval.

names.name: Paul
names.text: Setup  a  local  database,  create  some  tables,  build  a  HTTP  server  ,  create  routes on  the  Server  for  different  operations,  write  SQL  to  manipulate  the  data  in  the tablesâ€¦..and  the  list goes  on.
